file_content.text: [Inside the backpack, the Flesh Raider baby tears through the guid meat. It seems to gain some measure of strength.]
[It may now be able to survive a trip to the Jedi Temple and Master Quilb.]
[The Flesh Raider baby meekly gnashes its teeth, desperate for food.]
[As you check over the Flesh Raider's corpse, you notice movement from inside its backpack.]
[Master Quilb at the Jedi Temple has been known to take in orphaned animals, perhaps he would watch it.]
[A helpless Flesh Raider baby falls out of the backpack. It isn't aggressive and will obviously die if left here alone.]
[The baby is obviously starved and won't survive the trip without food. The meat of the greater guid along the mountain path should do the trick.]
